Documentation for both the Julia and the Matlab libraries can be found below. 

## Julia

Download the package via 

```{.julia}
] add TransmissionChannelAnalysis
```

or via 

```{.julia}
using Pkg; Pkg.add("TransmissionChannelAnalysis")
```

All code can be found on the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/enweg/TransmissionChannelAnalysis.jl).

Documentation: 

- [Overview](./julia/index.qmd)
- [Advanced Usage](./julia/advanced.qmd)
- [Internals](./julia/internals.qmd)

Download the toolbox from [GitHub](https://github.com/enweg/tca-matlab-toolbox) and save it to a location for later use. The documentation below gives further details on how to lead the toolbox.
